languages.text: "Разумеется. Без тебя мои шансы достать эту информацию были бы ничтожны. Вдобавок планы культа могут представлять угрозу для твоих миров — таких же, как Кьява Гамма".

traits.locale_text: "Разумеется. Без тебя мои шансы достать эту информацию были бы ничтожны. Вдобавок планы Культа могут представлять угрозу для твоих миров — таких же, как Кьява Гамма".

languages.text: "Of course. Without you, my chances of acquiring that information would be nonexistent. Moreover, the cult's plans could pose a threat to your worlds — just like Kiava Gamma."
languages.original_text: "Разумеется. Без тебя мои шансы достать эту информацию были бы ничтожны. Вдобавок планы культа могут представлять угрозу для твоих миров — таких же, как Кьява Гамма".

traits.locale_text: "Of course. Without you, my chances of acquiring that information would be nonexistent. Moreover, the Cult's plans could pose a threat to your worlds — just like Kiava Gamma."
"Of course. Without you, my chances of acquiring that information would be nonexistent. Moreover, the Cult's plans could pose a threat to your worlds — just like Kiava Gamma."
"Of course. Without you, my chances of acquiring that information would be nonexistent. Moreover, the Cult's plans could pose a threat to your worlds — just like Kiava Gamma."
"Of course. Without you, my chances of acquiring that information would be nonexistent. Moreover, the Cult's plans could pose a threat to your worlds — just like Kiava Gamma."

languages.text: “当然没问题。如果没有你的帮忙，我恐怕根本没机会得到这些资料。不仅如此，邪教的计划可能还会对你的诸多世界构成威胁，基亚瓦伽马星恐怕只是其中之一。”
languages.original_text: "Of course. Without you, my chances of acquiring that information would be nonexistent. Moreover, the cult's plans could pose a threat to your worlds — just like Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: “当然没问题。如果没有你的帮忙，我恐怕根本没机会得到这些资料。不仅如此，邪教的计划可能还会对你的诸多世界构成威胁，基亚瓦伽马星恐怕只是其中之一。”

languages.text: «Naturalmente. Sin su ayuda, me habría sido imposible obtener esta información. Además, los planes del Culto representan una amenaza para sus mundos, como ha demostrado el caso de Kiava Gamma».
languages.original_text: "Of course. Without you, my chances of acquiring that information would be nonexistent. Moreover, the cult's plans could pose a threat to your worlds — just like Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: «Naturalmente. Sin su ayuda, me habría sido imposible obtener esta información. Además, los planes del Culto representan una amenaza para sus mundos, como ha demostrado el caso de Kiava Gamma».

languages.text: 「もちろんです。陛下がいなければ、我がその情報を得るチャンスは存在しません。それに、教団の計画はそちらの惑星にも脅威をもたらすかもしれません。キアヴァ・ガンマのように」
languages.original_text: "Of course. Without you, my chances of acquiring that information would be nonexistent. Moreover, the cult's plans could pose a threat to your worlds — just like Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんです。陛下がいなければ、我がその情報を得るチャンスは存在しません。それに、教団の計画はそちらの惑星にも脅威をもたらすかもしれません。キアヴァ・ガンマのように」

languages.text: "Natürlich. Ohne Euch hätte ich praktisch keine Chance, diese Informationen zu erhalten. Außerdem könnten die Pläne des Kults Eure Welten bedrohen – genau wie Kiava Gamma."
languages.original_text: "Of course. Without you, my chances of acquiring that information would be nonexistent. Moreover, the cult's plans could pose a threat to your worlds — just like Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich. Ohne Euch hätte ich praktisch keine Chance, diese Informationen zu erhalten. Außerdem könnten die Pläne des Kults Eure Welten bedrohen – genau wie Kiava Gamma."

languages.text: « Bien entendu. Sans vous, je n'aurais pas eu la moindre chance d'acquérir ces informations. Qui plus est, les plans du Culte pourraient représenter une menace pour vos mondes, comme sur Kiava Gamma. »
languages.original_text: "Of course. Without you, my chances of acquiring that information would be nonexistent. Moreover, the cult's plans could pose a threat to your worlds — just like Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: « Bien entendu. Sans vous, je n'aurais pas eu la moindre chance d'acquérir ces informations. Qui plus est, les plans du Culte pourraient représenter une menace pour vos mondes, comme sur Kiava Gamma. »

languages.text: "Tabii ki. Sen olmasaydın söz konusu bilgilere ulaşma ihtimalim de olmazdı. Ayrıca tarikatın planları, Kiava Gama'ya olduğu kadar senin dünyalarına da tehdit oluşturabilir."
languages.original_text: "Of course. Without you, my chances of acquiring that information would be nonexistent. Moreover, the cult's plans could pose a threat to your worlds — just like Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii ki. Sen olmasaydın söz konusu bilgilere ulaşma ihtimalim de olmazdı. Ayrıca tarikatın planları, Kiava Gama'ya olduğu kadar senin dünyalarına da tehdit oluşturabilir."
